website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for compact spaces, this smaller organizer is a solid choice for those seeking a lightweight model.
pros: 5 smaller pockets for undergarments, socks, jewelry, or other clothing accessories
Pockets are clear for simple viewing and grabbing
Can easily hang on coat hanger
cons: Many buyers expected the organizer's pockets to be bigger

customer_reviews.title: 2 sided awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in one of the "Amazon Best" articles in the news on my phone and decided to give it a try. I LOVE IT! I now have handy storage for all my scarves. I don't have to drape them all over the place. It allows me to immediately see each one for quick selection. I even had extra pockets for gloves and stocking hats. I could see this being an awesome gift for students living in dorms.
customer_reviews.author: Sunseeker

customer_reviews.title: The best for organizing bras.
customer_reviews.text: I have over 50 bras and until I found this, nothing could help me keep them organized. The pockets are big enough for my largest padded bras (c cup) and I have no complaints. I can now find whatever bra I am looking for with very little effort where as before I would have to search for up to 10 minutes. I ended up buying 3 in total, and will likely buy another in the future. I recommend these to anyone wanting to get a handle on a messy bra drawer.
customer_reviews.author: AliKat

customer_reviews.title: Great even for outside-the-box items
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hanging closet organizer to organize some outdoor metal interchangeable garden flag finials & it does a great job of letting me organize them while still allowing me to see thru the mesh pockets to view the finials. The mesh seems to be pretty sturdy and I love that this can be washed (according to the instructions anyway). The hanger that comes with the organizer is a nice weight and is not having any problems holding all of my metal finials (14 in all). Love this already!
customer_reviews.author: BayouTi

customer_reviews.title: I love the larger pockets
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't buy this sooner! I used it for a trip just after I purchased it and was very impressed! It is very large and well made. I love the larger pockets. I will be using this for all my trips! My sons stuff fixes perfectly on one side! My better half stuff and mine fit on the other side. Now I don't have to worry about digging in a dark bag to find all the little things. I might use it between trips in my sons closet but I have a great set up with socks, hats etc. If I didn't already I would use this everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Holly E.

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. In fact, I liked it enough I've bought two. I honestly only need it for one side, so the double sided is an added benefit. I hang it on the wall next to my bed. It has a wireless keyboard, mouse, controllers, hand gripper, folders and papers, and much more in it currently. They are much more versatile than just making use for them for clothes alone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not large enough for some bras
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, but the pockets aren't large enough for what I ordered it for. If you are a DD cup or more, this is not the bra organizer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Used for another purpose
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter moved back home, she littered my bathroom countertop with her products. I was desperately looking for a solution and came across this bra hanger. It was the perfect solution. She hangs all of her face creams, masks, sunscreen and a ton of other miscellaneous items on the door in the bathroom. My counter is now clean!
customer_reviews.author: writerdame

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. Clearly, they appreciate their customers and stand behind (or in front) of their products. Definitely a company I would recommend and do business with again. You all are ROCK STARS!!! I'm a DDD cup and my bra's fit (a bit snug but they fit 1 per pocket) which allows me to free up some dresser drawer space for my poor husband. If you're thinking about getting one then DO IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent and more!!
customer_reviews.text: If there were more than five stars this would get as many as there were! I love it, best one of these I've ever ordered. The hanger and snaps are metal and durable and well finished. The pockets are the perfect size with enough variety to fit everything I need and very durable. Looks great and clean and is extremely well-made. I wish I had order another one before I left the country. I use it to help sort and hold all my magic tricks while I perform and it couldn't be better. I will definitely be ordering more in the future for other uses. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to store my bras in, they were getting crushed stuffed in my dresser drawers. This was perfect. Each pocket comfortably fits one bra and I could certainly double them up as well (size B). Would be great for other things like socks, scarves, etc. The pockets are big enough to ball up your fist and fit inside with a little room to wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really like this item. Came in perfect condition. I like how it doesn't look or feel cheaply made. Clear pockets make it easy to see where your items are and it makes my closet much more organized. Used it to store my husbands beanies and work gloves along with my hair dryer and other things to get ready with.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Perez

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this product is exactly what I was looking for, so I'm grateful for that. The pockets don't zip or button or close in any way; I wish they did. But It should do the job (storing bras) for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Former English teacher

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn as this product has good storage capacity pockets. I wish there was a snap/zipper or velcro to close each pocket as it puffs way out and takes up more space, and no protection from dust. It is useless for travel as everything falls out
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHonestReview

customer_reviews.title: I actually was looking for the perfect size pockets for camping
customer_reviews.text: I actually was looking for the perfect size pockets for camping. We hang this on a tree trunk and keep all those miscellaneous items you are always looking for. (bug spray, sunscreen, lighter, wine opener, etc) But I have to say this is the perfect size for the closet. Bigger pockets that are easy to get into, but not a full length one that goes to the ground. I will be buying another for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Karustis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hanging organizer - love the large pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few different hanging organizers and I liked this one so much I just ordered a second one (and may soon order a third). It's especially helpful that the pockets are large so they're great for organizing larger items (I use mine for socks, underwear and bulky winter accessories likes hats and gloves and I'm going to use the second one for organizing toiletries and cosmetics). The soft mesh pockets are great - clear enough to easily see what's stored but much nicer looking than clear plastic. And it comes with a very nice chrome hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Tamburello

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great. There was plenty of room for my sports ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great. There was plenty of room for my sports bras, panties, and socks. Each small pocket holds several panties and socks and I used the big pocket for my sports bras. I didn't try regular bras in it but looks like it could hold several. I would recommend it if your closet space is tight like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I use it for storing circular knitting needles and notions. The pockets are made of strong mesh, which I like so much better than the solid plastic ones. It's double-sided so there is plenty of room for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Too long for RV closet/Perfect leggings organizer
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this planning on using it in our camper bed-side closet, but it is too long. It's very good quality, so rather than return it, I found a different use for it. Each pocket is perfect size to hold a pair of folded leggings; I think it would also work well to hold t-shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage!
customer_reviews.text: I have it hanging in my closet for storing my bras. You could use it for jewelry, kids socks, small toys or anything else you can think of. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this for bras like it says it’s meant for. I use it for little nic nacs. It gives me a lot more storage space, and it fits perfectly in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Nadene D. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Using this for birthday, thank you, etc card sorter
customer_reviews.text: We have so many cards that I needed a softer\storage system for them and this is perfect! Big pockets and a large one across the bottom of each side. It hangs in a closet for easy access for quick picking of cards for Thank yous, birthday, sympathy, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Designing Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I am using this to store cables and small electronic ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to store cables and small electronic components such as DC power adapters. Works, holding together ok. Seems a little smaller than described.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I put in our closet to store winter gloves and hats. My womens gloves fit nicely one pair in one smaller pocket. My husbands gloves are more bulky and you can just fit one glove in each of the smaller pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Googlesoozel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's super I use it to organize baby granddaughter's sun hats,headbands, bows and Binky's effected to see through makes it easy to see where everything is and it gets put back in the same place
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Nikesch

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for stocking hats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to store your winter accessories: hats, gloves, and scarves. You can see what you have and it hangs nicely in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: UrMomShops

customer_reviews.title: It is in very good quality but as far as saving space
customer_reviews.text: It is in very good quality but as far as saving space, it is not as described. The pockets are too large especially the largest one. Yes, you can put more things in the big pocket but it takes a lot of closet space. I wish I ordered the one with smaller pockets so that the pockets can still hold their shapes and looks like what they show in the picture. It should be ok if you have a larger closet.
customer_reviews.author: X. rays

customer_reviews.title: Life is Easier Organized!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Love it so much I am going to order another one. I put all my two-piece bathing suits in one side and my bras on the other side. Endless uses!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sparks

customer_reviews.title: several pocket sizes
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for gloves, hats & scarves. It is great for lightweight items and has a nice variety of picket sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie93

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a college student!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received this from me as a Christmas gift, and she just returned to college for her second semester. She absolutely LOVES it and texted me (along with a photo showing it in her small dorm closet - filled to the brim) that "...this was the perfect gift!!! I needed this. Thank you so much." What a great gift for a college student!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great hanging organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! And it shipped very quickly. As most cruise ships will no longer allow over-the-door closet organizers because they damage the door, this one is on an actual hanger so it is perfect to hang in the clothes closet or on the robe hook on the back of the bathroom door. It could also be used in a regular hotel bathroom. The see-through pockets fit my entire family's toiletry items, everything from hair products, sunscreen, deodorant, etc.! Will be using this again on our next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Maile A. Gershwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this for camp trailer
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect to organize night gowns, undies, socks, etc when we go camping in out trailer. We have more closet space than drawers so this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scarf holder
customer_reviews.text: It held every scarf I own. I have no idea how many because I just kept stuffing them in. Did not add a lot of bulk to the closet. Perfect organization solution.
customer_reviews.author: Denise in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great closet organizer. We use it in our front hall closet to hold the gear for the dog - the bigger pockets work well for the leash, and it keeps it all out of sight until we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Michalsen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing my bra's. Wish I would have bought this sooner. Used the rest of the pouches for scrafs. Now everything is visibly easier to find and looks more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect accessory.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and durable. The pockets are very practically sized. I use it to store my medication and bathroom related electrical appliances. It is a perfect accessory.
customer_reviews.author: t12710c

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with one hiccup.
customer_reviews.text: Sure these are durable and good quality but there's one hiccup in my opinion. When you stuff the pockets on one side (I planned to use mine to hold sweaters), the other side is pulled too tight to use the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Great for small closet
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that wouldn't take up room in a small coat closet where I could put gloves, hats... The closet has a folding door so I can't hang anything from the top. This is sturdy enough for my uses - works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CRS

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for international travel/ small hotel accommodations. Easy to few items and fits in luggage
customer_reviews.author: Bellp

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 of these for my bras & panties ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my bras & panties to free up drawer space. Pleasantly surprised at the quality. I can put certain of my bras (depending on padding) 2 to the smallest pocket; about 3 pair of panties to the smallest pocket. This organizer beats pawing through my lingerie drawer to find what I’m looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice addition to my closet. It is not cheap looking, and the mesh pockets are sturdy. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LetsBeReal

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this organizer to store scarves, knit hats, and gloves. I roll the scarves up and store them on one side, and the hats and gloves on the other. It's perfect for this use. It seems quite sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Re-G

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Man i really should have gotten this earlier, my clothes are much better organized now, closet has much more space. This thing is impressively durable too, I really thought I was going to break it with all the clothes I've stuffed into it, but the material is tough enough to hold it all and not break.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these a year ago. One holds winter hats, gloves, scarves. The other I've used to hold scarves and small items in my closet. They are being gently used but so far have held up well. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: fabricsnob

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize bras and undies. I love it! It is good quality and doesn't look like it will fall apart or turn yellow like those cheap plastic organizers. The top pockets easily hold 3 or 4 soft cup bras or a few pair of panties. The lower pockets are are roomy enough for larger items like spanx and bathing suits. This is great product.
customer_reviews.author: S.Means

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old plastic shoe bag on the back of a bathroom door to hold turbans, headbands, bandaids, etc. etc. etc. Looks nicer and holds a lot more than the old one. I like being able to see what's in the pockets. Having a large bottom pocket on one side makes it versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and well made! Very helpful in organizing my closet without drawers!
customer_reviews.author: JLFMcC

customer_reviews.title: I love that is helped me organize my things and take ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for more storage in the 5th wheel. I used it on our last trip. I love that is helped me organize my things and take up such a small amount of space. I also love the lenth of it. It's not too long so it works in a smaller closet as we have in our trailor.
customer_reviews.author: Roseofthedesert

customer_reviews.title: Useful, came just as described
customer_reviews.text: Useful, came just as described. Great place for socks, belts, and other misc items in the closet. Easy access and easy to hang along with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: The quality is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hanging storage in January. The quality is better than I expected. I am using this in the coat closet to store my family's hats, gloves, etc. This is a great way to store these items and really cleans up our coat area in the house. I would recommend to anyone looking to organize similar items.
customer_reviews.author: PA Reader

customer_reviews.title: Well made closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect closet organizer. Really well made and sturdy. Will be ordering another for the closet in my craft room.
customer_reviews.author: Little Big Pony

customer_reviews.title: I love these however the hanger is not considered in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these however the hanger is not considered in the dimensions they are for bag only. Because I did not factor this in they were too long fir where I needed them. Husband had to modify to fit.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and saves a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: This was great for storing bras and socks. I have been looking for a place to have all of my bras without taking up too much room and this worked out great. It doesn't take up too much room and seems very sturdy. Would definitely recommend for organizing small items!
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally my bras and spanx have a home!! They’re tucked away nice n neat in the closet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: We were moving our daughter in for her first year at college and bought several different organizers. This was the perfect length for the inside of her armoire. They had put a towel rack on the inside of the door, so we used the hangar at first, but it bumped around too much. We took the hangar off and used a 3M picture hanging strip where the snaps are in order to just drape it over the towel rack. It has the perfect sized pockets for under garments, swim suits and socks. Seems well-constructed, but we may need to wait a bit to see how it holds up with every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine A. Stark

customer_reviews.title: It will free up small drawer space & give you more spaces for small items.
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for a closet & optional uses of pockets for various items as well as two-sided availability is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organizer
customer_reviews.text: Terrific organizer. I have a long, narrow closet and this works beautifully for organizing lingerie. Excellent quality construction and materials, and the clear pockets make it quick and easy to find what I need. Another one may be in the near future for me as I work my way through closet organization.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so college! Good for closet storage for hygiene items or even for snacks!
customer_reviews.author: M*******

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, large pockets, and adequate construction. I would prefer an off white or another color but that is not a big factor. It has enough pockets but not so many that I am overwhelmed with more then I need. I good choice for this type of organizer.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzy logic

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my plastic bins holding my socks n underwear.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and exactly what I needed. After I put things away ill.know if I need 1 or 2 more
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for traveling in our travel trailer. It holds so much and fits nicely in my closet! I would recommend this as a great solution for traveling or anyone who has limited space.
customer_reviews.author: susant

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Using it for mittens and gloves. Good size pockets, with larger ones on bottom. The mesh is far nicer than the vinyl ones & keeps things aired out.
customer_reviews.author: Big Max

customer_reviews.title: Used for winter scarves, gloves and knit hats
customer_reviews.text: Hangs nicely on our coat closet door over 1 hook. Worked well for all but i scarf which is bulky, which more or less fit into the large pocket. Seems to be well enough made to last for some time for my use.
customer_reviews.author: BSA

customer_reviews.title: I do have a dresser due to space restrictions so ...
customer_reviews.text: I do have a dresser due to space restrictions so these were my obvious choice. This really saves space and has a solid hanger to handle all the weight. I was concerned the mesh would fail quickly but it is very strong and flexible. Overall for the quality and price this product is a win all around. I bought two so far and I plan on getting another soon.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: neat and clean
customer_reviews.text: great for keeping lingerie sets together and visible instead of tucked in a drawer
customer_reviews.author: Sgaedke1

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clean, and durable, with mesh pockets which allow visibility and are just right size to hold and separate my many dozens of pairs of varied socks. Hangs unobtrusively w clothing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GRETA G.

customer_reviews.title: Its pockets are nice size. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: this hanging closet is very well made. Its pockets are nice size. Good quality, I would recommend to anyone needing something like this :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The organizer is so handy and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it had many adequately sized clear pockets I used for my belts, sox, lingerie, gloves etc. Really so useful and barely takes up space in closet. I can find things easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - and large
customer_reviews.text: Good quality organizer. I'm using it for craft items at shows. Sturdy hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC DOUBLE HANGING CLOSET ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this. It's perfect for holding bras, slips, nylons, etc. It is stronger material than a lot of the ones that you see in stores too. Also love the fact that its double sided.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy more!
customer_reviews.text: This hanging organizer is such good quality! I’ll be buying more. Large pockets. Great quality, even came with a very nice quality hanger!
customer_reviews.author: T. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for My Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This works great as an organizer in the coat closet. I have gloves, scarves and a couple of berets in mine. So happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: mochamarie

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: i wanted something i could store my bikinis in and its perfect! Nothing to catch or snag. The pockets are large enough for the underwire. It keeps them neat and separated.
customer_reviews.author: glc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect organizer for our cruise. We hung it in the closet for our toiletries on one side and shoes on the other. This is a sterdy product with a durable material and easy to wipe off. I was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Jex

customer_reviews.title: Love this as an organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am love the size of the pockets for this organizer as I can put my tights together accoriding to color. The pockets are wide enough to fit more than one pair and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Benedict

customer_reviews.title: This product meets unique storage needs.
customer_reviews.text: This product meets a need I have for storage of several items such as bras and socks. Its really sturdy and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient for organizing small things in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be much bigger! So.. I'm using it for drugs/supplements. Note picture~hanging next to size small shirts. Well made & like the hanging ability.
customer_reviews.author: mykat

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize so many different items. May need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy access storage
customer_reviews.text: Hung it in my closet to store winter scarves, gloves etc. I can now find these items readily.
customer_reviews.author: PK.

customer_reviews.title: Good Design & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely designed, well made product that is a pleasure to use. It comes with a very nice hanger. Works well to roll clothes to maximize storage. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: MobilePaper

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this bag especially for bulky underwire bras
customer_reviews.text: Get storage bag. I moved my bras for a dresser to this hanging storage. I now can see all the styles and colors I own. I would recommend this bag especially for bulky underwire bras. .
customer_reviews.author: Vaike

customer_reviews.title: Happy in Central Texas!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there must be some women out there who own this many bras, but I don't know them. I live in Central Texas where we wear sandals and flip flops 9 months out of the year, so I am using the Misslo Durable Hanging Closet to get them all up off of the floor. The pockets are durable, and big enough the hold a pair in each pocket. I am very happy with my hanging closet and I still have room for more flip flops!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Great for visors
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality with nice sized pockets. Received timely with no problems
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says in the description. Very heavy mesh material and comes with a solid metal hanger. Perfect for what I needed to organize which was handbags and belts. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeSavesLives

customer_reviews.title: Great for My pantyhose & stockings.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a way to organize all my pantyhose and stockings. This worked out great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Never go hunting for a specific pair of socks or underwear again! I was able to clean out my drawers and find a place for all my tights and Spanx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage to save space!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing all my lotions and sunscreens, and aloes for the summer in my closet. Barely took up any room.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: I've had it about A month so far so good. Could use a few different sized pockets but generally pleased
customer_reviews.author: herkimer

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place for all my bras/undies because i’m a victoria’s secret fanatic and a dresser would take up too much space. So, i read the great reviews for this item and purchased it. It is perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: arlene hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Well made should last a long time in closet easy access organization.
customer_reviews.author: CLINTON ANDERSEN

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to keep our winter gloves organized. This closet organizer works well in our coat closet. No more hunting through a basket for matching gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and useful
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. I will order another. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer for any closet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like both the size of the pockets and the fabric. It holds a lot and seems well made, a nice change from similar items usually made with vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace one that had fallen apart. It is very generous and holds all my stockings, socks, tights, and footies. I like the fact that the hose can get air due to the mesh fabric. Much better than plastic pocket hanging bags. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dance Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to see and good for storing underware
customer_reviews.text: large pockets and clear material. Very easy to see and good for storing underware, beauty products, computer cords and phones and many other things. Helps by getting stuff out of crowded drawers and visible. Great product. I'm going toorder more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and looks like it will last
customer_reviews.text: Exceed my expectations! It is sturdy and looks like it will last. I plan to order several more of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: bc in kc

customer_reviews.title: storage hanger
customer_reviews.text: large strong pockets - good quality - I will use it to store large chunky jewelry pieces as well
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: its little bit better then what I expected but overall the storage is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to store miscellaneous items in my draws, i.e. tights, swimsuits, etc. Seems strong and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly2989

customer_reviews.title: Storage!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing storage! I use it for all my workout tank tops
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: MISSLO Durable Hanging Closet Double Sided Bra Stocking Clothes Socks Organizer 15 Large Mesh Pockets, White
feature_bullets: Extremely durable oxford fabric + Breathable large mesh pockets, One side with 8 large mesh pockets, another side with 7 large mesh pockets;
The hanging organizer pockets are six inches square and open out, big enough for your largest padded bras, baby shoes;
Removable sturdy metal hanger included, Height: 33 3/4", Width: 17 1/2 INCH;
Ideally sized for bras, scarves, jewelry , pantyhose, hat, gloves, underwear and roll up t shirts;
Hangs in your closet and takes up a small amount of space, easy to roll up to pack in luggage during travel.
